data.name: Autoparts.text
data.value: Are You Looking For Auto Parts from Japan ? Many fully functional auto-parts are found on Japanese used cars, which are very much in demand as spare parts for the overseas market as well as in the domestic market. All appropriate car parts are carefully selected by professionals. You can order all type of Used Car parts, Auto Body Parts, Rebuilt Auto Parts, Refurbished Auto Parts, Auto Electrical Parts, Engine Parts of all types of makes.

data.name: AwanInter.content
data.value:
Awan International K.K is a proud member of Japanese Used Cars Association which is the most reputable organization in the Japanese used car export industry.


Being a certified company of different Japanese Used Cars Associations, we are a legally registered entity in Japan and have the license to buy and sell used vehicles as well as to export them. Japanese Associations also acknowledges Awan International K.K as a credible and established used car dealer. It bounds all members with the fair trade of used motor vehicles and prevents unfair transactions. Additionally, it protects buyers from stolen vehicles, illegally rebuilt or modified vehicles. Thus, provides support if complaints arise. We have been certified by Japanese Used Cars Associations because we strive for fair deals with our buyers and take a long term view on business.


There are thousands of used vehicle exporters online these days. Unfortunately, most of them are fraud companies and cheat innocent buyers by taking their money and then disappearing. When you deal with a Japanese Used Cars Associations certified company as Awan International K.K, you are assured of the legitimacy and are guaranteed of a fair deal.

data.name: cooperteoverview2
data.value:
Awan international K.K is a Japanese trading company. Our major role in the Japanese vehicle export industry providing all kinds of vehicles to individual buyers, dealers, industries and government organizations.


We are one of the leading vehicle exporters in Japan and serves customers in all over the world. Awan International K.K Established in 16 Feb 1999. We deal with a wide variety of Japanese used vehicles as well as brand new vehicles allowing you to buy your dream vehicle that you have been waiting for.

data.name: cooperteoverview3
data.value:
Our Values

1. Take challenges 2. Creativity 3. On Time Delivery 4. Teamwork 5. Real-time, interactive communication .

data.name: cooperteoverview5
data.value:
Fast communication track ..

Awan International, unlike many other organizations, fully supports an open culture by allowing employees to express themselves through 'chat with me', an interactive tool on the intranet where employees can have a dialogue with one another. Values

Awan International values its members, employees and initiates training programs for Awan International every once in a while. There are mind sharing sessions wherein different teams sit with each other; share project details, progress and future plans; and have an open forum of discussion where each is free to express their comments.

data.name: FAQ
data.value:
FAQ

Q#1: How to purchase Japanese used vehicle from us?

Follow these steps:


1. View our Japan, Russia, UAE, and Pakistan & South Africa used stock

2. Select your desired vehicle.

3. Click Get Invoice button & submit form with relevant information

4. Please check your mail, we will send you Performa invoice by mail or fax.

5. Performa invoice contains the CIF price along with bank details & mode of payment.

6. Arrange payment – The desired vehicle will be reserved for you upon full receipt of payment.

7. Arrange payment – The desired vehicle will be reserved for you upon full receipt of payment.

8. Shipment of the vehicle

9. The vehicle has successfully reached to the port of discharge and you can receive it.


Q#2: What is your vehicle's condition?

All vehicles are sourced from Auto Auctions and through franchise dealers & wholesalers in and around the central region of Japan. These vehicles are thoroughly checked by our team of professional buyer’s mechanic staffs before we stock them. All Japanese vehicles listed on our list are owned by Awan.com. We are not third party agents or broker.


Q#3: How can I create an account in your website?

You need to click here to create a new account and start shopping from us.

Q#4: How can I create an account in your website?

You can print the Performa invoice by clicking on “Get Invoice” button if you select a vehicle from our stock.


Q#5: In which countries do you export your vehicles?

We can export to any country where there is a legal law to import Used vehicles from Japan.


Q#6: How can I place my order?

See our Japanese Used Car Stock, South Africa Used Car Stock or Pakistan Used Car Stocklines:


Follow these simple step by step guidelines:


Select your desired vehicle.

2. Get invoice.

3. Make payment on invoice.

4. Shipping confirmation is sent.

5. Vehicle is shipped.


Q#7: What Documentation/ Information do you require from my side after i have transferred the amount into your bank account?

See our Japanese Used Car Stock, South Africa Used Car Stock or Pakistan Used Car Stocklines:


You are required to provide us with the following information / Documentation:

a) Consignee Name

b) Consignee Address

c) DHL Address:

d) Full contact information such as Contact No., Fax No., etc.

e) If the consignee and the purchaser are different than please let us know.

Please provide us with the above information in order to make sure that all the shipping documentation is correctly prepared before the shipment.



Q#8: What shipping documents will I receive?

You will receive the following shipping documents:


1. Bill of Landing

2. Customs Invoice

3. Export / Deregistration Certificate

4. English translation of Export / Deregistration certificate


Q#9: What is the payment method?

The mode of payment is PayPal online credit card payment & Telegraphic Transfer. This is the preferred method of payment as it is the quickest, safest and simplest method. It will take approx 3 days to receive and process your payment. You can also view thebank details page bank details page on our website. Payment should be made as soon as possible, in order to reserve vehicle as we work on the policy of first come first out basis.


Q#10: What currencies do you accept for payment?

We accept British pound (GBP), American dollar (USD), Euro and Japanese Yen.


Q#11: I cannot understand some of these shipping terms?

Please read the section Glossary of Shipping Terms


Q#12: How can assure Awan International K.K will assure us to send our vehicle here?

We have been in exporting motor vehicle business for last 20 years (1988-2008). We are proud to say, we never had a complaint stating that we have not shipped the purchased unit or units. We have satisfied customers in most of the countries for your references. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you need any references from your country.

data.name: howorder1
data.value:
STEP 1 Select -Find the Vehicle you wish right from your computer.

To find your intrest car search our stock by Make,Make model and many more search option. OR If you are autorized members we provide direct access via Awan International K.K to Japanese used cars auction. To get this access Contact Us .

STEP 2 Order-Negotiate with a Sales Representative to reserve your Vehicle.

Note: Registration is compulsory for Reservation/Negotiation. If you are not registered yet, please register now. Make sure the contact details you provide are correct and accurate.

Ordering Process in Detail

As soon as you decide to buy the car, just click the ORDER button to proceed your order or NEGOTIATE or talk with our Sales Representative via skype or email or phone.

Confirm Delivery and Shipment Time

It does not take long to ship your car, but it is better to confirm the exact delivery time to your region before proceeding your order exact delivery time to your region before proceeding your orde



Find out the Total cost of the Vehicle

The display price on the Vehicle information is only FOB price. i.e. the cost of the Car without any freight and extra charges. However it includes the cost of transportation from yard to the Port of Departure.

There are some other costs that you need to know.

Shipping Cost:

data.name: howorder2
data.value:
This cost is different for different countries.

Cost of clearing after landing to the nearest port to your region.

These charges may differ according to the region you are living in. To confirm these charges contact your local clearing agent and for assistance and advice talk to our experts.

data.name: howorder3
data.value:
Compulsory Inspection Fee for some countries

There are some additional inspection fees for countries like Zambia, Kenya, Uganda, and Tanzania.

data.name: howorder4
data.value:
Submit your Order

As you get cleared with car condition and cost to remit, proceed to process your order. # Get your proforma invoice

data.name: howorder5
data.value:
Your proforma invoice will be sent to you by email. To ensure quick shipment, please proceed with your payment as earliest as possible.

STEP 3 Payment-Receive Performa invoice and pay the required amount through Telegraphic Transfer (Bank Transfer) or Pay Pal.

Note: Please ensure that the transfer fee will be charged by remitting Bank when you send the money to us.

Options to remit your money

Telegraphic Transfer:

It is the most recommended method and can be arranged through a bank with foreign transaction service.

The most convenient option to remit payment by your credit card

There will be a 4% handling fee on top of the invoice amount Payment limit through PAYPAL is:minimum USD100 , maximum USD10,000 (Maximum amount depends on your registering country, so please consult to PAYPAL for terms and limitation).

data.name: howorder6
data.value:
Where to send the payment:

All payments (based on mutual agreement) must be made in full. Once full payment is received we will immediately arrange the shipping. For further information about shipping and payments please read our Terms & Conditions

Purchase confirmation

In situation when your payments are not received on time or if your car is not available in our stock, we will either give all your money back, or look for an absolute replacement for your vehicle. Otherwise you can select another vehicle from our stock for the same value.

Confirm the date of departure and arrival for your shipment through email from our logistics department.

Important Documentations The necessary documents you need to receive your car are

Export Certificate

This document is necessary for

Customs Invoice

It is used by your local custom department to evaluate the equivalent value of your vehicle.

BL

BL or Bill of Lading is needed at the port of destination (POD) to receive your vehicle from your nearest port.

Other documents may be required depending on your country's regulation. We can also send documents directly to the clearing agent on your request.

STEP 4 Shipment-Receive your Booking details, shipment information and other necessary documentation.

STEP 5 Custom Clearance - Either hire Services from the Local Clearing Agent OR settle the Taxation and Customs issues by your self.

data.name: howorder7
data.value:
Confirm about the following

Final arrival notice from the clearing agent.

Arrival Date is always tentative. Therefore for final confirmation, please contact you clearing agent a week before the actual date of arrival

Clearing your car is the last step before you drive your car away

Retrieve your car at the port!

Settlement of local charges

Pay the cost of clearing.

STEP 6 Drive - After Clearance, get your vehicle registered in your country and enjoy driving with!

After receiving your car don't forget to check the condition and compare it with the information sheet. At Awan Internation K.K Japan every vehicle is inspected by professionals and expert mechanics.

For any queries and confusions about car's condition, feel free to contact us.

data.name: MohammadalKhawajaInfo
data.value:
Hello Everyone, My name is MohammadalKhawaja and i joined Awan International Family in 2004.
I was honored to come on board because we share a common philosophy. We genuinely care about the people who have entrusted us with the task of finding the best solution to their automotive needs. I don’t like pressuring people and neither does Awan International KK. Nothing excites me more than when a customer expresses with sincerity how much they have enjoyed their car-buying experience and their enthusiasm to share their experience with others.
I provide the all the information to my clients to make the right decision. Any question to me is a fair question and I never assume my members understand the process. If I listen and understand their goals, I match the right vehicle to their needs. So, give me a call if you are looking for your next vehicle and I'll help you find the right vehicle you are looking for as well.

Establishing best business practices to create the “Raving Fan’s” of AWAN INTERNATIONAL KK is where my focus is today. I know that when a win/win situation is established with the processes we have put in place, and then establishing that customer for life is not very far away!

data.name: shippinginfo
data.value:
Shipping  Info

Japan has most advanced shipping and logistic facilities for handling the motor cargos. Depending on the type of vessels, there are 2 methods of loading motor cargo. One type of cargo is known as roll-on, roll-off (RORO), and the other is 20ft or 40ft Container Cargo.


RORO vessels (car carriers) are in tight supply as auto manufacturing is increasingly globalized throughout the past decade. The frequency of shipment for RORO type of cargo is lesser compared to other normal carrying vessels using 20ft or 40ft container cargo. Also not every port is covered by RORO vessels so for many countries the only choice left is Container loading.


Container loading shipment involves great effort and diligence and also requires know-how and experience. We have extensive stuffing experience of many years and you can be sure that your motor vehicles will be shipped securely, cost-effectively and in safe environment. We have also acquired the most cost-competitive rates due to our bulk shipments on regular basis. Below is an idea of container load shipment. Usually we manage to stuff multiple vehicles on to a 40ft Container depending on the sizes/dimensions of the vehicles.


To View the Glossary of all types of shipping terms, Click Here

Famous Shipping Companies List

data.name: TermsandConditions2
data.value:
Awan International K.K Stocks

You Name It. We Have It.


Wide range of vehicles is available for your online purchase under AWAN INTERNATIONAL K.K Stocks. Prices are quoted on FOB and C&F terms with respect to particular region.

All our prices are negotiable and inquiries are welcome. If you wish to visit us to purchase directly then FOB or C&F rates can also be negotiated upon request.

data.name: TermsandConditions3
data.value:
Auctions in Japan

Explore the world of Automobiles!


AWAN INTERNATIONAL K.K offers more than 200,000 vehicles per week on our online auction system. AWAN INTERNATIONAL K.K participates daily in auctions all over the world. AWAN INTERNATIONAL K.K receives auction data and photographs from the auction on daily basis. This information is loaded into e-Motors and offered online through our Online Auction page.

A refundable deposit is required to submit a live bid onto the online auction system. AWAN INTERNATIONAL K.K's customer service (CSC) personally confirms the deposit status of each customer at regular intervals. Services are available 24/7. Upon successful Bid; deposit payment is required within Five days of the purchase via Telegraphic Transfer (TT) or direct credit (Pay-Pal).

data.name: TermsandConditions4
data.value:
Terms of Trade:

• Customer should be registered on our Website before making a transaction. (Registration is absolutely free!)

• No deposit is required before confirming any car from the Ready Stock.

• Full or partial payment is required within seven days of confirmation via Telegraphic Transfer (TT).

• A deposit is required before shipment with the remainder due prior to release of the Original documents.

• Prices can be viewed with full vehicle details once you receive login credentials.

• Prices are quoted in United States Dollars (USD) & Japanese Yen, either in C&F or FOB terms

• Customers can pay in US Dollars, Japanese Yen, Euro, Pond Sterling etc.

data.name: TermsandConditions5
data.value:
Warranty

There are 2 warranties. Standard Warranty is compulsory.


Standard Warranty

Standard Warranty (as compulsory US$ 50): Covers vessel sinking, fire, or loss of cargo.

Coverage Area: Full CIF amount

Coverage Area:From Nagoya, Japan to Unloading point at your destination seaport yard.


NO CLAIM ACCEPTED, after unloading your vehicle at your destination seaport yard.

Standard Warranty

Silver Warranty (as optional, US$ 110): Covers vessel sinking, fire, or loss of cargo, damage (except by force majeure) and theft (except original audio/accessories).

Coverage Limit: Full FOB amount

Coverage Area: From Nagoya, Japan to Pick up point at your destination seaport yard (BEFORE DELIVERY).

NO CLAIM ACCEPTED, after you or your clearing agent picks up your vehicle at your destination seaport yard.

If you ask a clearing agent to pick up your vehicle, please tell the agent they must check vehicle condition before delivery (at seaport yard).

data.name: ARIFRAUFINFO
data.value:
Hi Everyone! I am ARIF RAUF, I am currently the Managing Director of Awan International KK, and I manage concentrating on work-flow, Purchasing, process improvement & documentation, efficiency enhancements, information management and meeting optimization solutions for the company.
My responsibilities also include implementing policies and procedures to support the strategic direction of the company and the management of the Information Technology staff.

data.name: cooperteoverview4
data.value:
Take Challenges

As a member of the “TAA Auction group, JAA Auction group, Honda Auction group, USS Auction group, HAA Auction group, JU Auction group and all other Japanese Auctions”, we export all types of Japanese cars including major manufacturers such as Toyota, Honda, Nissan, Mitsubishi, Mazda, Subaru, Isuzu, Suzuki and Daihatsu with a vast selection of models, colors and age. We are also able to ship on short notice to anywhere in the world

Creativity

Awan International most important factor is the speed of innovation and our creative thinking will determine the extent of our success.

On Time Delivery

Awan International K.K is not only experts in Japanese used vehicles, we also source and export Korean and American cars and auto spare parts, machinery and used construction vehicles made by the world's leading manufacturers.

Teamwork

We have highly creative and organized Japanese and international staff that are committed to providing outstanding service levels to its customers and to maintaining quality, safety and satisfaction standards at the highest possible levels. The Awan value system is committed to excellence in delivering quality and customer service by empowering employees.

data.name: auction1
data.value:
Auction

    As you become a registered member of AwanInternational K.K, you will get access to more than 100 auction houses and as a result around 30,000 cars each day. You can find a car, car parts, view its details, and even bid a car right from your desktop at the comfort of your home.

    At AwanInternational K.K, the entire process of used car auction is as easy as 1, 2, 3 See the steps below.


    Step-1 Become a registered member

    Register to become a member of AwanInternational K.K and get access to the entire stock available at multiple auction houses.

    Step-2 Security Deposit

    Deposit an initial security amount which is usually $1,000 or Yen 100,000 to bid for a vehicle worth less than 1 million. We need to hold this amount before we bid on any of the cars. If the bid does not get successful, security deposit is fully refundable or adjustable in the customer's account based on customer's request.


    Bidding Deposit Details.
    Deposit Rank Deposit Amount USD Buying Budget 2000% USD Deposit Amount Yen Buying Budget 2000% Yen Purchasing Limit
    A $10,000 $200,000 \1,000,000 \20,000,000 No Limit
    B $5,000 $100,000 \500,000 \10,000,000 10 Units
    C $3,000 $60,000 \300,000 \6,000,000 4 Units
    D $2,000 $40,000 \200,000 \4,000,000 3 Units
    E $1,000 $20,000 \100,000 \2,000,000 1 Unit
    We need above deposit from the customer to allow him to start bidding.

    Step-3 Bidding Cars from Auction

    Please, fill up lot number, car name and the bidding price in the Auction order form.

    We will only charge the actual auction price at which the bid is won. So try to bid as higher as you can in order to increase the chances of winning the bid.

    Step-4 Auction Result

    As we get succeed with your bid, we will notify you that your bidding has got success. You will receive an invoice that includes total price of car. The price will be calculated with the original selling price of auction.

    Step-5 Final Payment

    The final payment will be paid in 5 working days. Payments made on the committed time will help us save your order from cancellation.

    Step-6 Shipment

data.name: auction2
data.value:
The shipment will be arranged as soon as the payment is confirmed.

Note: At Awan.co.jp you will find the best shipping services with lowest

Step -7 Documents

As the ship leaves from Japan, we will send all the documents by EMS, DHL or FedEx. The documents included are;

Export Certificate

Bill Of Lading

Invoice

Marine Insurance if any

JAAI Inspection and other inspections, if any

Note: There are no extra or hidden charges other than CNF or CIF price. All the charges are included in mentioned price

Payment Method & Bank Charges

You can arrange payment via telegraphic transfer through your bank. All bank charges must be paid by the sender. Please, ensure that payment is in US Dollars / Japanese Yen, and please include your Invoice & Stock number in the description field.

Payment can also be made online via PayPal through your credit cards.

Terms for Payment via PayPal

There will be a 4% handling fee on top of the invoice amount.

Payment limit through PAYPAL is:minimum USD100, maximum USD10,000

(Maximum amount depends on your registering country, so please consult to PAYPAL for your limitation.)

Once the payment has been arranged, please, send us confirmation of payment with Proforma Invoice and/or full name, address, Telephone/Fax number for contact purposes by info@awan.co.jp or Fax +8176-6598750.
The amount of the payments decided on the mutual agreement must be made in full. We will only arrange the shipping once the payment is received. For further information about shipping and payments, please read our Terms & Conditions . or contact info@awan.co.jp

Auction Links


Useful Auto Auctions in Japan
Map of Auto Auctions in Japan

data.name: glossary2
data.value:
Bill of Lading (B/L)

A document that establishes the terms of a contract between a shipper and transportation company. It serves as a document of title, a contract of carriage and a receipt for goods.

Arrival Notice

A notification sent by the carrier on ship's arrival to the consignee, the "Notify Party" and - when applicable - the "Also Notify Party." These parties in interest are listed in blocks 3, 4 and 10, respectively, of the Bill of Lading.

Demurrage

A penalty charge against shippers or consignees for delaying the carrier's equipment beyond the allowed free time. The free time and demurrage charges are set forth in the charter party or freight tariff.

Act of God

An act beyond human control, such as lightning, flood or earthquake.

CFR or C&F (Cost and Freight) (...Named Port of Destination)

A Term of Sale where the seller pays the costs and freight necessary to bring the goods to the named port of destination, Terms of Sale but the risk of loss of or damage to the goods, as (continued) well as any additional costs due to events occurring after the time the goods have been delivered on board the vessel, is transferred from the seller to the buyer when the goods pass the ship's rail in the port of shipment. The CFR term requires the seller to clear the goods for export.

CIF (Cost, Insurance and Freight) (...Named Place of Destination):

A Term of Sale where the seller has the same obligations as under the CFR but also has to procure marine insurance against the buyer's risk of loss or damage to the goods during the carriage. The seller contracts for insurance and pays the insurance premium. The CIF term requires the seller to clear the goods for export.

data.name: glossary3
data.value:
FOB (Free On Board) (...Named Port of Shipment):

An International Term of Sale that means the seller fulfills his or her obligation to deliver when the goods have passed over the ship's rail at the named port of shipment. This means that the buyer has to bear all costs and risks to loss of or damage to the goods from that point. The FOB term requires the seller to clear the goods for export.

(Ro/Ro)

A shortening of the term, "Roll On/Roll Off." A method of ocean cargo service using a vessel with ramps which allows wheeled vehicles to be loaded and discharged without cranes.

Performa Invoice

An invoice provided by a supplier prior to the shipment of merchandise, informing the buyer of the kinds and quantities of goods to be sent, their value, and specifications (weight, size, etc...)

Commercial Invoice

Represents a complete record of the transaction between the exporter and importer with regards to the goods sold. Also reports the content of the shipment and serves as the basis for all other documents about the shipment.

Letter of Credit (LC)

A document, issued by a bank per instructions by a buyer of goods, authorizing the seller to draw a specified sum of money under specified terms, usually the receipt by the bank of certain documents within a given time.

Confirmed Letter of Credit

A letter of credit, issued by a foreign bank, whose validity has been confirmed by a domestic bank. An exporter with a confirmed letter of credit is assured of payment even if the foreign buyer or the foreign bank defaults.

data.name: glossary4
data.value:
Irrevocable Letter of Credit

Letter of credit in which the specified payment is guaranteed by the bank if all terms and conditions are met by the drawee and which cannot be revoked without joint agreement of both the buyer and the seller.

Confirming Bank

The bank that adds its confirmation to another bank's (the issuing bank's) letter of credit and promises to pay the beneficiary upon presentation of documents specified in the letter of credit.

Consignment

(1) A stock of merchandise advanced to a dealer and located at his place of business, but with title remaining in the source of supply.
(2) A shipment of goods to a consignee.

Consignee

A person or company to whom commodities are shipped.

Shipper

The person or company who is usually the supplier or owner of commodities shipped. Also called Consignor. A classification, storage or switching area.

Freight Forwarder

A person whose business is to act as an agent on behalf of the shipper. A freight forwarder frequently makes the booking reservation.
